description:
Koga has a battle with a mysterious man inside a cave. Eden tries to understand why Aria left him and the world he is wants to build for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pégase à terre. Un voyage pour reprendre courage !
The Flightless Pegasus! The Journey of Forfeit!
Tobenai Pegasus! Soushitsu kara no Tabidachi!
とべないペガサス! 喪失からの旅立ち!
